Articles.Content:
Hello Fellow Kerbalnauts ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I thought it was time i said hello to you all, i have being a lot of KSP since release of 1.0.0 and have been lurking in the background here on the forums almost daily.

So with my upcomming Duna mission, it seems a good time to said hi to all ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hello MassCannon, and welcome to the forums!

Good luck on your Duna mission.

Happy landings!
Good luck with the mission! Welcome to the forums, it's always nice to see a new face.
Hello MassCannon. There's lots of friendly people on this site, and some excellent advice for apprentice Kerbalnauts. Good luck with your Duna mission.
Yes, good luck on your mission and welcome to the forums, we're happy to have you here!
